name: Delver
aura: Increases Ally ATK in Faction Crypts by 27%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Necrotic Toxin

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff on the target for 3 turns if the target has a [Heal Reduction] debuff. This debuff cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Mark for Death

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns before attacking. If the target has a [Weaken] debuff, places a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
skills.name: Finisher
